narrative.title: Xxx Corps - 1942Q1
narrative.situation: British Armoured Corps deployed in North Africa during 1942Q1.
narrative.objectives: Reserve and support corps holding frontier and railhead area. Responsible for logistics support to forward XIII Corps. Army tank brigade in reserve for infantry support operations. Less mobile than XIII Corps but providing armored reserve and rear area security.
narrative.axis_objective: Hold current positions and prevent Allied breakthrough.
narrative.allied_objective: Advance and neutralize Axis defensive positions.

weather.terrain: Frontier area and railhead, rocky desert terrain

air_support.note: No theater air summary available for this quarter

special_rules: Army tank brigade for infantry support (Matilda II heavy armor)
Railhead logistics management for entire Eighth Army
Reserve formations for reinforcement of forward positions

environment.terrain_type: Frontier area and railhead, rocky desert terrain
